name: Doodle's Diary
description:
Doodle's Diary is an independently developed tower-defense game, with procedurally generated maps, varying levels of difficulty and infinite, replayable fun! We hope you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed developing it. Thanks for playing!

The fullscreen button can be found on the bottom right.

P.S. 
- The first load of the game may take a while but the game is worth the wait!
- You may also experience lag on the web version, it is highly recommended to download the game files and play it locally. Links can be found under Download.

How to play

You can either play directly on this browser or follow the respective installation instructions at the bottom.

Controls

Can be found in the game! A short tutorial is also included on your first playthrough!
